text_block_list.text:
After declaring that she would quit<n>modeling, Gold City fully
devotes<n>herself to training. But something's<n>off today...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, I lost momentum at the end<n>again. What's wrong with
me?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I threw away my career for this!<n>Trainer, hit me with your
most brutal<n>training regimen!
choice_data_list: Why don't we take some time off?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Are you serious? But I can still—
choice_data_list: No buts! You need a change of pace!
No buts! You need a change of pace!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
O-okay, gosh... Don't have to go into<n>scary teacher mode.
Fine, I'll rest.<n>Happy now?

On our day off from training, I'm<n>walking around town when
I spot Gold<n>City at a cafe.

She's staring at her phone, looking<n>troubled. I figure maybe
I should leave<n>her alone, but she catches sight of me<n>
before I can leave.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...I know you're there. Sneak around<n>all you want—you can't
mask your<n>annoying aura.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: What, this? Oh.... just looking at old<n>pictures.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Records of practice and my diet, and...<n>some work things.
Don't need these<n>anymore.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Not really. I can just delete them.<n>Racing is all that matters to
me now.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Not that I have the times to show for<n>it... I just, I don't know,
can't go those<n>last few meters.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Well, change of pace, right? C'mon,<n>if you hover around
looking like my<n>manager, you can be my unwanted<n>
attention repellant.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh, but don't actually act like myguardian, yeah? Just keep your mouthshut and look like you belong.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: What a boring movie.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: They had a few brands I like, butnothing really caught my eye...Sigh.

No matter where we go, Gold City<n>doesn't seem to be
having a great<n>time.

All of a sudden, she stops and looks<n>up. A huge
advertisement with her<n>face on it looms overhead.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? N-no! Just, it's hard to ignore,<n>isn't it? But whatever,
won't see any<n>of those anymore.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Once I retire, the next model will take<n>my place. Stand still for
a second, and<n>you'll fall behind and fade away.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Good riddance, I say. The cameras<n>never saw the real me
anyway. Just a<n>worthless, fake illusion.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...I'm exhausted.
She suddenly stops in her tracks<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...Go on, spit it out. You've been<n>wanting to say something,
haven't<n>you? This whole time—I can tell.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ugh. What, another one of your<n>lectures? No, I'm not
missing<n>anything. My past needs to be tossed<n>out.
choice_data_list: And that includes your phone's pictures?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What are you even talking<n>about? What does my
phone have to<n>do with anything?
choice_data_list: All your modeling memories, that's what.
All your modeling memories, that's what.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: A-are you stupid? Those meannothing to me, okay? All I careabout is running.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Here, I'll delete them right now. I<n>don't need them!
She whips out her phone and opens<n>the photo app.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Stupid pictures! I'm so done with<n>these... stupid...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: No! ...Er, fine, whatever. Just a little.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
...This was my first time in front of a<n>TV camera. Look at my
face, I'm<n>trying way too hard... I can't.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
This was my first commercial. It did<n>pretty good. This is me
crying after my<n>first screwup. Don't look. You never<n>saw
that.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
This... this was my first pic with a fan.<n>Said her dream was
to be a designer,<n>and have me wear her clothes.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
choice_data_list: These don't look very fake to me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, shut up! What do you know, huh?!<n>I'll delete them—all of
them!

Her slender finger taps the Select All<n>button, then inches
toward Delete...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I'll do it, just... just you watch...
Then, her finger stops.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why? ...I decided to throw this life<n>away. I have to, or my
running'll<n>never amount to anything!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
So why... why, when I'm running, do<n>all the memories come
flooding back?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
During practice, and races—why does<n>it feel like there's a
gaping hole in my<n>heart?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why can't I just throw it all away? I<n>just want to be rid of
it, please!
choice_data_list: You don't need to throw away the real "you."
You don't need to throw away the real "you."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Aha... You're so stupid. You literally<n>said that already. Get a
new line,<n>stupid. I just can't with your<n>stupidity.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh for—No, I really can't!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...No, you did not just say that.What, you think you're like my partnerin crime now? Yeah, right!
choice_data_list: No, I think I'm your trainer!
No, I think I'm your trainer!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Seriously! How do you keep it up?!<n>Be discouraged for
once! Stop<n>bothering with a pain in the ass like<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...Stupid. Stupid, stupid, stupid. You areso stubborn, and cringe, andweirdly arrogant!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Honestly, what even areyou? Oh right, you're my "trainer."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ...You really think I could run both<n>roads?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Yeah... maybe. I guess I just have to<n>keep looking.
choice_data_list: It might take some time—but that's okay.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Stupid. Telling a runner to take thingsslow? Sigh. I should probably saysorry to my manager.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Hah! Oh, I'm dying just picturing it.<n>But no, I started this, so
what do you<n>have to apologize for?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Appreciate the sentiment, but I'll do<n>this myself. And I'll tell
her that, well,<n>I've got two legs—one for racing, one<n>for
modeling.
